summary: The diff demonstrates fixes addressing application startup errors through error handling improvements in React Query hooks (useQueries.ts), QueryClient configuration with retry logic in App.tsx, and backend error handling. The changes align with requirements REQ-18, REQ-19, REQ-20, and REQ-21 by implementing graceful error handling for authentication and backend actor initialization.

hallucinated_features.description: Added 10 new life-centric motivational messages to the backend motivationalMessages array
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly states in non-goals: 'Modifying the motivational message content'. The diff shows new messages like 'Life is a precious gift. Cherish every moment.' and 'Your existence has meaning, purpose, and value.' which were not requested.
